titleStmt.title: The old wiues tale A pleasant conceited comedie, played by the Queenes Maiesties players. Written by G.P.
titleStmt.author: Peele, George, 1556-1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Danter, and are to be sold by Raph Hancocke, and Iohn Hardie,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
